attributes.action: Reduce the University fees of International students.
attributes.additional_details: All those who are in this situation are facing many mental health issues.Most of the students are paying above 10000 for online classes and without part time jobs many of them are not even eating well. There are students those who can't go back to their home country because of many circumstances. It will be a great help for all the international students those who are affected by this.
attributes.background: Due to covid-19 most of the International students and their parents in home country lost their job. Many of the students are not paid the university fees or not fully paid the fees.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Tuition Fee Compensation for International Students in UK Universities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572202

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
